name: MetalEater (Slendykray)
description:
MetalEater - it's a 3rd person parkour cyberpunk slasher inspired by Ghostrunner and Cyberpunk 2077. 

The plot is abot the guy from poor district who got a bunch of implants installed and now he wants revenge to thoose who did it with him.

This is a prototype withot much graphics, because i first want to know does my game even interesting in the gameplay aspect, so leave a coments and feedback at all, please, some interesting ideas, that can help the game feel better are in appreciation.

The game supports: English and Ukrainian localization, Xbox and PS controller input, keytips.
